name: Rescue Agent 51!
description:
AGENT 51 (the love of your life) SENT AN ALARM SIGNAL FROM A DISTANT PLANET!

YOU NEED TO FIND AND RESCUE HER (be her heroe)

WASD MOVE 

WALL JUMP

ARROWS SHOOT

GOOD LUCK SOLDIER!

 Music and Sound Design by Isaac S. Johnson

Art/Code by Jeuiop

Game made on 48hours for SHENANIJAM with them AGENT51
